sentences: Miho Karasawa (唐沢 美帆, Karasawa Miho, born July 15, 1983) is a Japanese singer and lyricist from Tokyo who was previously signed to Horipro and is currently signed to Lantis.
Since 2014, she has performed under the stage name True (stylized as TRUE).
Karasawa made her debut in 2000 with the release of the song "Anytime, Anywhere".
